metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8099 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Incorrect returning of an error code in the index.c:read_entry() function leads to a double free in libgit2 before v0.26.2, which allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted repository index file.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Downgrading to low: "As the index is never transferred via the network, exploitation requires an attacker to have access to the local repository."

criterions.comment: libgit2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
